main event: A civilian and a member of the Canadian Air Force observed a bright light in the sky while driving along the Ottawa River, which exhibited unusual zig-zag movement.
interesting points: The light was initially thought to be an aircraft landing light,The object was brighter than a star and white in color,There was a humming sound when the object passed behind a cloud,Rockcliffe Airport confirmed no aircraft were in the sky at that time,The witness had considerable experience with aircraft and was certain it was not one.
sighted object: a bright white light in the sky
witness description: a civilian and a member of the Canadian Air Force
